features.additionalInfo: It's for business customers who want to borrow a set amount of money to pay back over a set loan term up to 30 years depending on security type
It's suitable for various business costs and investment purposes
It's flexible to your needs. Choose a fixed or variable interest rate, your loan term, repayment frequency and type (interest only, principal and interest, or both), and loan security type
You can refinance existing business purpose debt
Digital access is available via Netbank, CommBank App and CommBiz
For secured loans you can nominate a guarantor during the origination process

If you're on a variable interest rate, you may be able to withdraw any additional repayments you make on your loan anytime. You can easily access your redraw online, through NetBank, the CommBank app or CommBiz.
Relationship management is available for eligible customers

features.additionalValue: What are the features of Agri Green Better Business Loan ?
features.additionalInfo: Discounted finance for eligible new environmental projects on your farm. Redraw is not available for Agri Green Loan. Other rates, fees,charges, lending criteria and T&C's apply.

features.additionalValue: What are the features of Business Green Better Business Loan ?
features.additionalInfo: Discounted finance for eligible new projects or assets. Redraw is not available for Business Green Loan. Other rates, fees,charges, lending criteria and T&C's apply.

features.additionalValue: What are the features of  Boost Better Business Loan ?
features.additionalInfo: Borrow up to $100,000 with an up-front establishment fee, 3 month repayment holiday at the start of the loan and pay no interest on your loan. Other rates, fees,charges, lending criteria and T&C's apply.

features.additionalValue: What are the features of SME Guarantee Scheme Better Business Loans?
features.additionalInfo: The SME Guarantee Schemes loans are not available from 30 June 2022. discounted finance for eligible customers was available for loans ranging from $10,000 to $5,000,000. Other rates, fees,charges, lending criteria and T&C's apply.

constraints.additionalInfo: Boost Better Business Loan has a maximum limit of $100,000
SME Guarantee Scheme Better Business Loans had a maximum limit of $5,000,000

eligibility.additionalInfo: Businesses of any size, including sole traders, partnerships, trusts and registered companies.
Groups or individuals using the lending facility for business purposes.

eligibility.additionalValue: You're more likely to be approved if:
eligibility.additionalInfo: You haven't been overdrawn or had your account in arrears anytime in the past 3 months.

eligibility.additionalValue: You're more likely to be approved if:
eligibility.additionalInfo: You haven't been declared bankrupt in the last 5 years.

eligibility.additionalValue: You're more likely to be approved if:
eligibility.additionalInfo: You haven't had any accounts in collections in the past 6 months.

eligibility.additionalValue: You're more likely to be approved if:
eligibility.additionalInfo: You have a minimum 30% deposit (for secure loans) as well as cash reserves to demonstrate that you can operate the business for at least the first 3 months.
Must have had a CommBank Business Transaction Account for the last 12 months
Application for financing must be for an eligible environment project
Must have a cash balance or loan balances of more than $1 million, and have a demonstrated farming related income
Application for financing must be for an eligible  project or asse
Must have a cash balance or loan balances of more than $1 million, and have a demonstrated farming related income

fees.name: Loan establishment fee
fees.additionalInfo: Rates and fees differ based on the type of security you provide for your loan, your loan amount and other factors. Loan establishment fee apply. We'll confirm what they are in your Letter of Offer.Fees include Loan establishment fee, Monthly loan service fee or other fees. Does not apply for loans funded under the SME Guarantee Scheme. Applies to Business Boost loans funded under the SME Guarantee Scheme.

fees.name: Monthly loan service fee
fees.additionalInfo: Rates and fees differ based on the type of security you provide for your loan, your loan amount and other factors. Monthly loan service fee, Other fees apply. We'll confirm what they are in your Letter of Offer. Fees include Loan establishment fee, Monthly loan service fee or other fees. Does not apply for loans funded under the SME Guarantee Scheme.

fees.name: Other fees apply
fees.additionalInfo: Rates and fees differ based on the type of security you provide for your loan, your loan amount and other factors. Monthly loan service fee, Other fees apply. We'll confirm what they are in your Letter of Offer. Fees include Loan establishment fee, Monthly loan service fee or other fees. Does not apply for loans funded under the SME Guarantee Scheme.

fees.name: Early Repayment Adjustment
fees.additionalValue: Applies only to Fixed rate loans - to cover break cost of modifying or terminating a fixed loan contract.
fees.additionalInfo: Does not apply for loans funded under the SME Guarantee Scheme.

fees.name: Administration Fee
fees.additionalValue: Applies only to Fixed rate loans - to cover the administration and documentation costs of modifying or terminating a fixed loan contract, including the cost of calculating the Early Repayment Adjustment (ERA)
fees.additionalInfo: Does not apply for loans funded under the SME Guarantee Scheme.

fees.name: Security Processing Fee
fees.additionalValue: Payable per chargable events to cover the costs the bank incurs in setting up and maintaining the security associated with the loan.
fees.additionalInfo: Does not apply for loans funded under the SME Guarantee Scheme.

data.name: BetterBusiness Loan
data.description: A simple loan to help you manage or grow your business. It can be secured or unsecured with flexible repayment options. For Businesses that want to borrow from $10,000 for business purposes, want to make extra repayments and access them with redraw, want to pay interest only on the amount they owe and want flexibility in how they repay their loan.
